thread.title: 5 untold things about Motherhood #MondayMommyMoments
thread.title_full: 5 untold things about Motherhood #MondayMommyMoments

posts.author: Varsh
posts.title: 5 untold things about Motherhood #MondayMommyMoments
posts.text:
Varsh 

I belong to the generation that has been witness to some of the most life-altering situations in terms of social perceptions. From seeing our homemaker mothers at our beck and call all day and having our fathers perform few household chores, we are acclimatising ourselves to the changing equations where both parents are bread-earners and share the entire load equally. 
Motherhood, hence, has also seen a drastic change in its approach and responsibilities over time. True, like always we have a whole lot of unsolicited advice pouring in right from the time that stick shows two lines to the time we’re prepared to marry our kids off. Yet, we’ve now come to acknowledge the fact that pampering and canoodling our kids isn’t entirely what motherhood is all about. We can and we do a lot more than that. 
Despite knowing that every mother’s journey is special and unique, I would like to share certain things I’ve learnt from my experience of raising two kids, mostly with no extra set of hands for help. 
I feel terribly guilty now for all the eye-rolling and silent sniggering when I was leaving home for higher studies and my Mom wept uncontrollably while letting me go. Just sending a toddler A Jr to school made me realise that separation anxiety is a real thing in mothers , although the intensity might change for individuals. Dealing with it can be challenging but one cannot feign being untouched by it. 
Children today appreciate being treated as equals and are more matured and understanding than we were at their age. While our education system doesn’t take practical learning into consideration much, as mothers we need to introduce them to concepts like handling money, personal security, good touch and bad touch, etc at an early age while not letting them get overwhelmed and feeling reasonably accountable. 
I loved keeping a diary as a teenager, a practice which seems I was into eons ago. That time, however, is safely nestled between those pages and a peek into them once a while makes me go all mushy and nostalgic. Imagine having your kids’ precious childhood carefully preserved through photographs, a diary or a blog and being your companion in old age when they’ve flown away from the nest ! Yes, motherhood will make you love keepsakes more than ever. 
People unfairly expect motherhood as an excuse to harbour prejudice for you regarding matters that do not concern them. Whether you go to work leaving your toddler behind or take a career break to willingly tiptoe around it, you are going to be judged . Everything you do will be scrutinised with scant respect for your everyday hardships. All you can do is develop a thick skin and learn to shrug it off nonchalantly. Whatever you choose to do, never ever regret it. 
Sorry to burst your bubble, but motherhood isn’t all sweet and rosy. Some days you wish you hadn’t put yourself in this situation (of course you don’t mean it) while some days you want to fast forward a few years of your life to a time when your kids will be independent and won’t need you round the clock. Be assured, you’re not in this alone. These thoughts run through every mother’s mind at some point in her life. Not everyone accepts it though. 
Do you identify with any of these points? Do leave a comment and let me know. 🙂 
Linking this with Amrita and Deepa for #MondayMommyMoments Advertisements

posts.title: 揭秘二战美造假城迷惑敌人:3万人在地下造战机_网易军事
posts.text:
（原标题：揭秘二战美造假城迷惑敌人：3万人在地下造战机）
参考消息网11月7日报道 英国《每日邮报》网站11月5日发表题为《美军二战期间在西雅图造假城隐藏战机制造厂》的报道称，二战期间，美国极为担心本国飞机制造厂遭到袭击，他们为掩盖制造战机行动建造了一个完整社区。
据新公布的照片显示，美国陆军工程兵与波音公司在西雅图郊外伪造了一个完整社区，那片建筑群占地面积超过170万平方英尺（1平方米约合11平方英尺）。
据网上公布的内容显示，1941年12月7日日本偷袭珍珠港后，美军希望建造一个安全的航母（舰载机）生产设施，为美国参战助一臂之力。
1942年初，波音公司仅花了1美元从当地一名卡车司机手中购得一块地，开始兴建这个名为“二厂”的设施。
旧设施——即“一厂”——当时已过时，所用设备也很差，因此无法加速建造战机。新设施可简化程序，利用装配线技术加快生产工作。
短短几个月的时间，“二厂”便开始生产B-17“飞行堡垒”、B-29“超级堡垒”、B-47“同温层喷气”和B-52“同温层堡垒”等战机。“二厂”在二战期间及战后一直在生产战机。
这座小镇是在布景师约翰·斯图尔特·德特利的帮助下建成的，镇上建有假的街道、人行道、草木、围墙、小汽车和住宅。但在这个假社区的下面，有3万人在以300架/月的速度努力建造飞机。
幸运的是，这座伪造的小镇从未受到过考验，因为盟军最终在1945年年底前战胜了轴心国。该飞机制造厂后来一直沿用至冷战结束，最终于2010年被拆除。
资料图：美国陆军工程兵与波音公司在西雅图郊外伪造的社区。
本文来源：参考消息网 责任编辑：万博_NBJS5114

thread.title: 贯彻全国金融工作会议精神，坚持诺信企业文化和方向
thread.title_full: 贯彻全国金融工作会议精神，坚持诺信企业文化和方向

posts.title: 贯彻全国金融工作会议精神，坚持诺信企业文化和方向
posts.text:
贯彻全国金融工作会议精神，坚持诺信企业文化和方向 2017-11-07 14:36 
北京2017年11月7日电 /美通社/ -- 2017年10月25日，诺信金融研究院召开了“解读全国金融工作会议，引领诺信企业发展方向”主题会议。会议中，诺信的领导根据此前全国金融工作会议内容，结合诺信的实际情况，对金融工作会议强调的“回归本源、优化结构、加强监管、市场导向”四个原则做出初步解读。 
作为金融、类金融企业集群，诺信在创立发展过程中，总体行为和指导思想符合国家金融决策和监管机构的大政方针，这构成了诺信可持续发展的基础。诺信领导人表示，全国金融工作会议的原则为诺信未来发展提供了指南和坚实的保障，而此次对四个原则的解读更是企业坚持贯彻全国金融工作会议精神的前进举措。 
以下为诺信基于其实际情况，对金融工作会议的四个原则所做出的初步解读。 
1、 回归本源，服务实业 
金融为实业服务，但其作为一个独立体系，如果不加引导，很容易形成自我循环、自娱自乐、自我繁衍的局面，从而丧失其基本社会功能和存在价值。事实上，从2008年金融危机开始，中国总体采取宽松货币政策，广义M2平均增长率高达16%，远高于GDP增长率。虽然最近两年M2增长率有所下降，但依然高于GDP，加之地方政府举债过度，货币超发，而相应的资金主要流向股市债市，尤其是房地产市场，导致泡沫丛生， 实业发展依然举步维艰。 诺信 
诺信一直以服务实业为己任，其投资的食品、环保、再生铜等多个项目均为实业项目。这些实业项目的投资，不仅为投资者带来了现实和潜在的收益，也为发展和成长中的实业项目注入了资金、经验和经营管理方法，助推了实业发展。 
诺信杨董事长在25日会议中强调金融为实业服务的本质，这是诺信的投资理念甚至企业文化的核心部分。诺信以“合规经营是根，支持实业为本”为经营机构的指导方针，开实业服务风气先河，正是其对监管机构政策导向持续解读的结果。“金融为实业服务”原则在整个金融体系中的贯彻，将为诺信的实业投资提供更为坚实的基础和广阔的空间。 
同时，全国金融工作会议上提出的金融要全面提升服务效率和服务水准，这也要求诺信全体员工从本职工作做起，注重细节、提高质量，配合诺信大战略的实施。 
2、 优化结构，把握重点 
金融结构复杂多样，全国金融工作会议上强调了直接融资与间接融资的比例，把直接融资作为未来发展的重点。诺信认为，这个提法具有多方面意义，举例而言，IPO的数量和规模仍将保持在相对比较高的水平上，为私募股权投资提供了更多的退出机会和空间，这实际上是一个利好消息。会议同时强调优先发展中小银行和民营金融机构，这对以诺信为代表的民营金融机构而言，是一个历史性的机遇，企业未来发展空间拓展值得期待。 
3、 强化监管，防控风险 
全国金融工作会议释放出强烈的监管信息，其中之一是会议宣布设立国务院金融稳定发展委员会。该委员会是在一行三会传统监管体制之上，对混业经营与分业监管相冲突的现实所导致的大量监管空白点所采取的对策，“很长时间一直听靴子响，这次终于落了地”。这个对策主要是补齐监管的短板，填补空白，同时监管层级上升到了国务院高度，解决了分业监管存在的协调问题。该对策虽然在业界预期之内，但其本身具有强化监管的强烈意蕴。 
此外，会议强调“加强功能监管，更加重视行为监管”，并加强监管的专业性、统一性和穿透性。显然，这个提法把监管深入到了微观层面，对细节关注进入监管范围，监管的力度和方式转变是基于这个提法之上的。与机构的审慎监管相比，行为监管更多地从消费者和用户保护的角度提出具体监管要求，从措施上看，要把所有的金融业务全部纳入监管范围，这也是堵塞漏洞的具体行为措施。 
宏观上的监管具体到企业层面就是风险控制和合规。而风控与合规一直是诺信文化的核心部分，与服务实业同时成为诺信的社会承诺。杨董事长曾多次强调，风险控制是诺信企业经营的核心职责，这也是对监管机构和监管措施的积极回应。 
4、 深化改革，市场导向 
扩大开放，坚持市场导向，是落实金融服务实业，同时也是实施“一带一路”战略的保障。诺信参与国家大战略的实施，在“一带一路”战略实施过程中，也开启了自己的布局。随着对全国金融工作会议所提出工作任务的逐步落实，诺信业务也将跟随国家脚步，实现更高层次的发展。 
此次“解读全国金融工作会议，引领诺信企业发展方向”主题会议的召开是诺信在经营效果和风险控制两方面持续努力深耕的体现，杨董在会议中提出的经营方针为日后诺信工作的开展提供了指导性的方针，而诺信金融研究院对全国金融会议精神的解读也为行业内提供了思考的方向。 消息来源: 诺信金融研究院

thread.title: Skotvopnum í umferð fjölgar í Bandaríkjunum
thread.title_full: Skotvopnum í umferð fjölgar í Bandaríkjunum

posts.author: RÚV
posts.title: Skotvopnum í umferð fjölgar í Bandaríkjunum
posts.text:
Skotvopnum í umferð fjölgar í Bandaríkjunum 07.11.2017 - 09:21 Erlent · Bandaríkin Mynd: AP Skotvopnum fjölgaði í umferð í Bandaríkjunum um 11 prósent í fyrra. Þá fjölgaði þeim Bandaríkjamönnum sem voru drepnir með skotvopnum um 12 prósent á hverja 100 þúsund íbúa og voru það árið 33 þúsund Bandaríkjamenn skotnir til bana. 
Samkvæmt tölum Miðstöðvar upplýsinga um almannaheilsu þá hefur á fyrstu þremur mánuðum þessa árs enn orðið fjölgun í hópi þeirra sem falla fyrir skotvopnum í Bandaríkjunum. 
Nokkrar skotárásir hafa verið gerðar í Bandaríkjunum undanfarna mánuði þar sem mannfall hefur verið mikið. Staðfest er að 26 féllu í valinn þegar byssumaður réðist inn í kirkju í Texas í miðri guðsþjónustu á sunnudag og hóf þar skothríð. Hin látnu eru á aldrinum fimm til 72 ára. Þetta mun vera versta fjöldamorð í sögu Texasríkis. Sá sem grunaður er um árásina hét Devin Patrick Kelley og var 26 ára gamall. Hann fannst látinn í bíl sínum skömmu eftir árásina. Í byrjun október varð annar Bandaríkjamaður, Stephen Paddock, 59 að bana í skotárás í Las Vegas. Þorvaldur Friðriksson

posts.title: (USA-MI-Redford) Senior Teller
posts.text:
Co-op services Credit Union Senior Teller in Redford , Michigan 
Overview 
CO-OP Financial Services is currently looking for a Full-Time Head Teller in our Redford Branch. 
The Head Teller assists branch management by providing day to day leadership, direction, and training to tellers and by maintaining Branch and Best Practice goals. 
What your day will look like: 
Resolves credit union/member problems, including follow-up with credit unions or members as needed. 
Maintains control of the vault cash and replenish teller cash drawers; verifies incoming and outgoing currency deliveries; controls money orders, gift card and travel card inventories and shared branch products; makes remittances as required and prepares bank deposits and branch daily cash orders. 
Performs branch settlement process; balances ATM(s), and completes branch recap; audits tellers and supervisors cash drawers/bags. 
Performs loan closings and disbursements, and loan file maintenance. 
Performs additional branch operations and teller functions. 
Supervisor Functions and Responsibilities: 
Supervises tellers on a daily basis; provides on-going feedback and direction to staff; assists in on-going training of staff; prepares branch schedules as assigned. 
Prepares monthly branch performance summaries; provides input for teller performance appraisals. 
Qualifications 
To perform this job successfully, the Head Teller must have communication skills that demonstrate interpersonal and customer service skills along with leadership skills in interacting with and assisting staff. Previous customer service and cash handling experience required; previous sales or cross-selling skills experience preferred. Ability to pass computerized teller skills assessment. Experience using computer, keyboard & mouse, and calculator skills preferred. Demonstrated basic math and clerical skills. Demonstrated knowledge of policies and procedures, and judgment skills to make reasonable exceptions to policy and procedural guidelines. Experience using a computer, keyboard & mouse, and calculator skills required. 
Must exhibit the following service standards: 
Responsible for ensuring that exceptional service is delivered to both internal and external clients by “doing what’s right for credit unions 
Demonstrate enthusiastic support of corporate mission, CO-values and long term objectives. 
Perform job duties within our policies procedures, service standards and state and federal laws. 
We are seeking someone with two years of teller experience with CO-OP Shared Branching and one year as a Teller II required; six months of experience as Senior Teller preferred and performance at level 3 for the last twelve months OR two years of previous experience in a cash-handling and customer service environment, one year of supervisory experience required; one year of supervisory experience with a financial institution preferred. High school diploma or G.E.D. 
Branches are open Monday thru Friday from 9:00 a.m. – 7:00 p.m. and Saturdays from 9:00 a.m. – 2:00 p.m. 
If you or someone you know can perform the duties and responsibilities required of the Head Teller and have the skills and experience required, please submit your resume to be considered for the opportunity. 
About Us 
CO-OP Financial Services is the technology engine that provides access and convenience for credit unions. With over 35 years of credit union service, CO-OP connects credit union members to their accounts through Debit, Credit, ATM, Shared Branching, Member Interaction Services, Mobile, Virtual, and Bill Pay services. CO-OP serves a total of 3,500 member credit unions, 50 million cardholders, 30,000 surcharge-free ATMs, and more than 5,300 shared branches (with 2,000 self-service locations). Handling three billion-plus annual transactions, CO-OP is the nation’s largest credit union service organization—offering resources that enable deeper member engagement to help credit unions prosper. 
Job LocationsUS-MI-Redford

posts.text: – says court process being abusedControversy surrounded the preliminary inquiry (PI) into the death of 16-year-old Queen’s College student Neesa Lalita Gopaul yesterday when Defence Attorney Vic Puran argued for the discontinuance of the pre-trial matter involving the dead teen’s mother Bibi Gopaul and the mother’s lover Jarvis Small.Bibi Gopaul and Jarvis SmallApart from this, the prosecution’s final witness, Bibi Gopaul’s father, Mohammed Kayum, was deemed a hostile witness since the man’s evidence to the court “could not be taken with total confidence”. Another controversial aspect arose when the defence argued that the court procedural process had been abused.Before the clashes of the opposing sides, Assistant Superintendent of Police (ASP) Marlon Chapman returned to the witness box to be cross-examined by Jarvis Small’s lawyer Senior Counsel Bernard De Santos and Puran.During Chapman’s testimony, information was released to the court which sparked numerous objections by Puran. It was noted that at the time, necessary evidence to charge the accused was not with the police, NFL Jerseys Cheap Wholesale , yet Gopaul and her co-accused were charged with murder.Subsequent to that revelation, Puran stood up to make a joint application on behalf of De Santos and himself. He claimed that the preliminary inquiry into Neesa Gopaul’s death should stop for the simple reason of the court’s procedural process being abused.This came in light of Chapman’s evidence. Puran argued that the accused should have never been arrested since the police did not have evidence to consider that the couple had committed the crime. He continued that it was a violation of every known right and further a violation of the accused individuals’ human rights that they were charged when evidence against them did not exist.That matter was addressed by Chief Magistrate Priya Beharry who noted the application. Subsequently Gopaul’s father, Cheap Nike NFL Jerseys , Kayum, Cheap Jerseys Free , took to the witness box.On the previous occasion, Cheap MLB Jerseys China , the PI was adjourned prematurely when Kayum requested to approach the Magistrate to disclose his discomfort with the prosecutor. Kayum alleged that the prosecutor was forcing information on him and that he was being made to say what is in favour of the prosecutor. Prosecutor Pritima Kissoon on that occasion explained that the witness was indeed given material to refresh his memory, since he had difficulty remembering what he had told the police. Kissoon also said that what Kayum was given was in relation to the statements that he gave subsequent to Neesa Gopaul’s death.Puran at that time made submissions for Kissoon to remove herself as prosecutor in the matter. He sought to display Kissoon’s measures as illegal and further called for the witness to be deemed hostile since his evidence would be one that would not be given willingly to the court.The court ruled on those applications yesterday and it was in favour of the prosecution. Prosecutor Kissoon was made to remain in the matter. The court said that the prosecutor did not deny any of the allegations made by the witness, but instead offered an explanation for her actions. The explanation was enough to dispel any consideration of wrongdoing by the prosecutor.As the PI continued, Kayum took the stand. He maintained that he did not remember the events leading up to him now being in court. And after a few unwilling answers to the prosecutor’s questions, Kissoon requested that the court deem Kayum a hostile witness, prior to saying that he was refusing to co-operate with the prosecution. That application was granted by the court.After that, Puran again made a submission. In relation to Chapman’s evidence, Puran said someone should be held responsible for charging the accused. The prosecutor had stated that the Director of Public Prosecutions (DPP) had advised the police to charge the accused with murder.Puran then said that if Chapman, “a policeman four ranks below that of Commissioner could say on one hand that there was no evidence to charge the accused and on the other hand the office of the DPP instructed the police to charge the accused, then someone from that office should be brought to court to explain why the arrest was made”. Puran said it would be in the interest of clarity for the court to make its ruling as it pertained to ceasing the court procedure in the PI. This issue was also the catalyst for Puran claiming an abuse of court process.The Magistrate however assured Puran that the court would seriously consider his application to have the PI stopped, NHL Ice Hockey Jerseys , but as the lawyer continued to press the issue, an answer was given. The court revealed that the PI will not stop and neither will anyone from the DPP’s office be summoned.The Magistrate further opined that what was before the court was adequate to continue the procedure. In light of that, Cheap Jerseys From China , Puran advised that the defence would then be moving to the High Court to get a motion to discontinue the pre-trial matter.Magistrate Beharry then advised that the court had no issue with the lawyer’s wishes. Puran was further advised that until the High Court orders a halt in the matter, the PI would be continuing without delay.The matter was adjourned until next Wednesday, May 23.

thread.title: Scaricare musica da Youtube gratis
thread.title_full: Scaricare musica da Youtube gratis

posts.author: Alberto Marini
posts.title: Scaricare musica da Youtube gratis
posts.text:
Contatti Privacy Cookie © 2005-2017 Trilud S.p.A. - P.iva:13059540156 - Tutti i diritti riservati. Tecnocino fa parte del network NanoPress Tecnocino, supplemento alla testata giornalistica NanoPress registrata presso il Tribunale di Milano n° 314/08 Scaricare musica da Youtube gratis Come scaricare musica da YouTube gratis, guida completa per il download di brani audio con servizi online, programmi PC Windows e Mac e applicazioni iPhone e Android da Alberto Marini , il 7 Novembre 2017 
Saper come scaricare musica da YouTube gratis permette di salvare i brani preferiti sul proprio smartphone o tablet in modo semplice e rapido. Per il download di brani audio sono disponibili programmi e software appositamente sviluppati e disponibili gratuitamente online. All’interno della piattaforma di condivisione video di Google è possibile cercare un numero illimitato di canzoni e scaricarle tramite alcuni servizi online che non richiedono nessuna installazione. In questa guida completa andiamo a scoprire insieme quali sono i migliori trucchi e app per scaricare musica da YouTube gratis . Non resta, quindi, che vedere da vicino come realizzare il download dei propri brani preferiti, gratuitamente e in pochi e semplici passi con servizi online e app per Windows, Mac, iPhone e Android. 
Prima di scoprire come scaricare musica gratis da YouTube , è importante sottolineare che l’atto di scaricare da Internet brani protetti da diritto d’autore è un reato. Seppur sia molto facile estrarre l’audio da tutti i video presenti sulla piattaforma YouTube, l’azione di scaricare musica protetta non è considerato legale. A questo punto, andiamo a vedere da vicino i migliori servizi e programmi con cui scaricare musica gratuitamente. YtMp3 
Il primo programma online per scaricare musica da YouTube in MP3 si chiama YtMp3 . Questa piattaforma è un vero e proprio convertitore completamente gratuito, semplice da utilizzare, che permette di estrarre i file audio contenuti nei video di YouTube. Per scaricare la musica non è necessario nessun account e basta conoscere, semplicemente, l’indirizzo URL del video. 
Una volta entrato nella homepage di YtMp3, a partire da questo link , incolla la URL all’interno dello spazio “ Please insert a valid video URL “. Dopo aver incollato l’indirizzo premi sul pulsante Convert per avviare il processo di conversione. In pochi secondi, verrà prodotto il file audio e potrai scaricarlo gratuitamente sul tuo computer. Flvto 
Un’altra piattaforma particolarmente utile ed efficace per scaricare musica gratis da YouTube è Flvto . Nel dettaglio, Flvto offre un servizio ancor più completo rispetto alla precedente, visto che permette offre la possibilità di convertire video YouTube in file MP3, MP4 o AVI. Allo stesso tempo, è possibile vedere anche i video più visualizzati e scaricare l’audio in pochi secondi. 
All’interno della homepage di Flvto, accessibile da questo link , incolla il link al video che hai scelto. A questo punto premi sul pulsante Converti ed inizierà tutto il processo di conversione. Entro pochissimi secondi avrai la possibilità di scaricare direttamente sul vostro computer il file audio, oppure potrai inviarlo via email, Dropbox o creare anche una suoneria. Freesound 
Altra piattaforma molto interessante, considerata una valida alternativa ai precedenti programmi è Freesound . Si tratta di un convertitore completamente gratuito, che permette di scaricare tracce MP3 e video MP4 da YouTube. L’interfaccia grafica è estremamente semplice e minimalista. 
Entrando nella homepage, cliccando qui , inserisci nella barra di ricerca il link al video YouTube. Incollato quest’ultimo fate click sul pulsante a forma di lente d’ingrandimento. Nella nuova pagina potrai riprodurre il brano audio, scaricarlo sul computer, visualizzarlo su YouTube o condividerlo tramite Facebook e Twitter. VidToMP3 
Tra le migliori piattaforme online per scaricare musica da YouTube gratuitamente vi è anche VidToMP3 . L’interfaccia grafica di questo sito web è veramente semplice, ma il servizio offerto è di qualità e molto semplice. VidToMP3 permette, infatti, di ottenere musica da YouTube, Dailymotion, Vimeo e molti altri siti web. 
Per utilizzare VidToMP3 basta entrare nella homepage, a partire da qui , incollare il link del video da convertire in file audio. Adesso, premi sul pulsante download e dopo qualche secondo potrai scaricare il file cliccando sul link “ Click here to get your Download link “. Si aprirà una nuova pagina web all’interno della quale dovrai cliccare sul pulsante “ Download MP3 “. ClipConverter 
Anche ClipConverter può essere considerata la soluzione per tutti coloro che non vogliono installare nessuna app. Non a caso, ClipConverter è un servizio completamente gratuito con cui è possibile scaricare musica da YouTube nei formati MP3, M4A o ACC. 
Per utilizzare ClipConverter basta inserire il link del video YouTube nella pagina ufficiale , selezionare il formato di conversione audio e fare clic su Download . Qualora nella pagina sia presente un messaggio simile a “ Download with accelerator and get recommendation offers “, è necessario togliere il segno di spunta al fine di non scaricare programmi promozionali non desiderati. SoundCloud 
Rispetto ai precedenti servizi, SoundCloud è un vero e proprio sito dedicato agli appassionati di musica. Si tratta, infatti, di una piattaforma in cui vengono caricati remix di brani famosi, podcast e brani di artisti indipendenti, accessibile da questo link . 
Alcuni brani sono disponibili solamente per lo streaming, anche se la maggior parte delle canzoni presenti su SoundCloud è possibile scaricarla gratis. Per scaricare una canzone da SoundCloud entra nella homepage del sito web, digitare il titolo del brano e premere il tasto Invio . Altrimenti, fai click sul pulsante Explore more trending music per visualizzare tutta la musica più interessante del momento. App per scaricare musica da YouTube gratis 
In alternativa ai servizi online che ti abbiamo presentato, esistono anche applicazioni completamente gratuite Windows, Mac, iPhone e Android . Tutte quelle che andiamo a scoprire insieme sono disponibili come download gratuito e supportano un’ampia gamma di formati musicali, tra cui anche il formato MP3. YouTube Downloader per Windows 
Un’applicazione gratuita per scaricare musica da YouTube gratis per PC Windows è YouTube Downloader . Si tratta di un programma gratuito e open source che si basa su youtube-dl , un famoso software per il download dei video da YouTube. Per ottenere YouTube Downloader basta accedere al sito web ufficiale e fare clic sul pulsante Download , posto sotto il logo di Windows. 
Terminata l’installazione, devi avviare YouTube Downloader per scaricare la musica direttamente da YouTube. L’app richiederà di inserire il link del video e premendo sul pulsante Download , verrà creato un file MP3 da poter caricare su smartphone, tablet o qualsiasi altro dispositivo. 4K YouTube to MP3 per Windows e Mac 
Se possiedi un computer Windows o Mac , 4K YouTube to MP3 è il software ideale per scaricare video da YouTube e convertirli in vari formati audio tra cui MP3, M4A e OGG, mantenendo la massima qualità possibile. Questa applicazione è completamente gratuita, anche se presenta alcune limitazioni riguardanti il download delle playlist e la funzione di iscrizione ai canali. Quest’ultime possono essere eliminate con l’acquisto di una licenza. 
Per utilizzare 4K YouTube to MP3 basta scaricare l’app dal sito ufficiale e una volta terminata l’installazione devi avviarla e incollare l’indirizzo del video YouTube che desideri scaricare. Per cambiare il formato o la qualità dei file prodotti è necessario entrare nelle Preferenze del programma e modificare i valori nei menu Formato e Qualità . Total Downloader per iPhone 
Hai un iPhone e vuoi scaricare musica da YouTube gratis? Total Downloader è l’app ideale visto che può essere scaricata gratuitamente all’interno dell’ App Store di Apple. Total Downloader permette scaricare video da YouTube e trasformarli in file audio MP3, in pochi passi. Non solo, tra le tantissime funzionalità offerte, vi è anche la possibilità di impostare una password di accesso alle cartelle, in modo tale da archiviare in modo semplice e sicuro tutta la musica scaricata. TubeMate Downloader per Android 
Per quanto riguarda il mondo Android, tra le migliori app vi è sicuramente TubeMate Downloader che permette di scaricare musica da YouTube in modo semplice e rapido. Per scaricare gratuitamente questa app vi suggeriamo entrare all’interno del sito web , dal momento che esistono tantissime applicazioni clone presenti su Google Play Store. Non solo, prima di avviare la procedura di download, è necessario attivare il supporto alle origini sconosciute, all’interno delle impostazioni del sistema operativo di Google. 
TubeMate Downloader è un’applicazione semplice da utilizzare. Dopo aver scaricato il brano è possibile ascoltarlo attraverso il player musicale del sistema operativo. Tuttavia, seppur sia completamente gratuita, TubeMate Download potrebbe richiedere l’installazione di MP3 Video Converter.

posts.text:
TentaĂ§Ăľes de Fim de Semana 
HĂĄ dias vimos na pĂĄgina d’Â A Rapariga do Blog ao Lado Â – estaÂ maravilha –Â do Bolo de Noz . Â FicĂĄmos inspiradosÂ e fomos para a cozinha!
Portanto o nosso Bolo maravilha deve-se Ă inspiraĂ§ĂŁo do Blog que referimos acima! 
Para o Bolo vĂŁo precisar de: Â Â 
6 ovos 150Â gr de farinha de amĂŞndoa 50gr de fĂŠcula de batata 150 gr de aĂ§Ăşcar de coco  
 
 
PreparaĂ§ĂŁo Bimby:
Seguimos os passos do bolo base, livro ABC:
PrĂŠ-aqueĂ§a o forno a 180ÂşC. Insira a borboleta. Coloque no copoÂ as 6 claras eÂ o aĂ§Ăşcar de coco,Â bata 6min/37ÂşC/vel4.Â De seguida bata 6min/vel4. Â Adicione as farinhas previamente misturadas, envolva 5seg/vel3. Por fim envolva com a ajuda da espĂĄtula. Levar ao forno por 15 a 20 minutos. Deixar arrefecer dentro da forma e desenformar.  
PreparaĂ§ĂŁo Tradicional:
PrĂŠ aquecer o forno a 180ÂşC. Bater as 6 claras com o aĂ§Ăşcar, atĂŠ que forme um merengue. Envolver as farinhas bem misturadas. Vai ao forno prĂŠ-aquecido em forma redonda (ou de tarte) com papel vegetal. Levar ao forno por 15 a 20 minutos. Deixar arrefecer dentro da forma e desenformar. PreparaĂ§ĂŁo doÂ doce de ovos:
As 6 gemas que sobraram 6 colheres de sopa de aĂ§Ăşcar de coco 6 colheres de sopa de ĂĄgua Colocar a ĂĄgua e oÂ aĂ§Ăşcar num tachinhoÂ anti-aderente, levar ao lume baixo, atĂŠ que se dissolva oÂ aĂ§Ăşcar deixando ferver por uns minutos. Retirar do lume e deixar arrefecer um pouco.
Batam as gemas, com um garfo e introduzam um pouquinho da calda do aĂ§Ăşcar para as temperar e poderem incorporĂĄ-las no resto da calda, com muito cuidado para nĂŁo cozerem. Mexer sempre atĂŠ engrossar, em lume brando.
Bimby: Podem seguir os passos da receitaÂ do Doce de Ovos, respeitando estas quantidades.
Decorar com amĂŞndoa laminada a gosto. AtenĂ§ĂŁo que ĂŠ de BABAR!

posts.author: sololite
posts.title: Parent with terminal illness, wondering whether to sell the family home before death
posts.text:
“ The problem is that the attorney must only consider the interests of the donor. Whilst it my be difficult they are not allowed to put their own personal feeelings above this. This is just one of the reasons to think very carefully before taking the job on. Originally posted by Yorkshireman99 ” Many people act as attorney for a declining parent, which they usually agree to without ever imagining quite what they might have to undertake in the future as unexpected or unimagined events occur.
But Id suggest it is preferable to having an unknown professional acting as deputy, when youd not even have any input in what steps are taken, such as the choice of a care home, or the disposal of personal belongings, or being informed of decisions taken. Being an attorney can be very demanding, but it is a job usually done out of love for the donor, and a way of caring for that person as they lose the ability to look after themselves.

thread.title: Rehber öğretmenlere öğrenme güçlüğü eğitimi verildi
thread.title_full: Rehber öğretmenlere öğrenme güçlüğü eğitimi verildi

posts.title: Rehber öğretmenlere öğrenme güçlüğü eğitimi verildi
posts.text: Rehber öğretmenlere öğrenme güçlüğü eğitimi verildi Yozgat Şehir Hastanesi tarafından rehber öğretmenlere öğrenme güçlüğü eğitimi verildi. Anasayfa Gündem Rehber öğretmenlere öğrenme güçlüğü eğitimi verildi Güncelleme : 2017-11-07 12:27:49 Site 0 Tweetle 0 Yozgat Şehir Hastanesi tarafından rehber öğretmenlere öğrenme güçlüğü eğitimi verildi.Yozgat Şehir Hastanesi konferans salonunda düzenlenen programda Çocuk ve Ergen Ruh Sağlığı Uzmanı Uz. Dr. Ümit Işık tarafından öğretmenlere Çocuklarda Öğrenme Güçlüğü eğitimi verildi. 20 çocuktan 1’inde öğrenme güçlüğü olduğunu söyleyen Işık, öğretmenlerin farkındalığı ile bu çocuklara ulaşılıp, tanı konularak, tedavi sürecinin başlatıldığını söyledi.Işık,"Özgül öğrenme güçlüğü; dinleme, konuşma, okuma, yazma ve matematik yeteneklerinin kazanılmasında ve kullanılmasında önemli güçlüklerle kendini gösteren karmaşık bir bozukluk olup, okul çağı çocuklarındaki sıklığı en az yüzde 5’tir. Kabaca düşünüldüğünde her sınıfta mutlaka 1-2 çocukta disleksi yani okuma bozukluğu bulunmaktadır. Özgül öğrenme güçlüğü eğitim sistemiyle yakından ilintili bir bozukluktur. Bu nedenle ilköğretim döneminde tanı konmaktadır. Siz değerli rehber öğretmenlerimize büyük bir görev düşmektedir. Bizler de bu eğitimi vererek yeniden farkındalık oluşturmak istedik. Özgül öğrenme güçlüğü yaşayan öğrenciler; düşük okul başarısı ve akranlarından anlamlı derecede geri olmalarıyla fark edilebilirler. Disleksi tanılı bir çocuk bazı harfleri öğrenmede zorlanabilir, okurken hece ekleyip çıkarabilir, uydurabilir, ters okuyabilir, okuma hızı yavaş ve hatalı okumaları olabilir, okumada yaşıtlarını daha geriden takip etme, okurken okuduğu yeri kaybetme, satır atlama ya da aynı satırı tekrar okuma gibi belirtiler gösterebilir" dedi.Öğrenme güçlüğünün bir zeka geriliği olmadığını, uygun psikiyatrik ve eğitimsel destek alınmazsa kendiliğinden düzelemeyeceğini anlatan Işık,"Yaşam boyu sürebilen bir bozukluk olan dislekside erken tanı erken müdahale için çok önemlidir. Çocuğunuzda disleksi olduğunu düşündüğünüzde lütfen bir çocuk ve ergen psikiyatri uzmanına başvurunuz" diye konuştu.Kaynak: İHA Site Yorumları Kalan karakter sayısı : 500

thread.title: Parent with terminal illness, wondering whether to sell the family home before death
thread.title_full: Parent with terminal illness, wondering whether to sell the family home before death - MoneySavingExpert.com Forums

posts.author: Keep pedalling
posts.text: I think it best if you could sell, but there are some things you should consider. Your POA ends on the death of your mother which could impact any sale going through at the time as you will no longer have the authority to sell as POA and the no sale can complete until probate has been obtained. If you are also the named executor of her will and her estate is a simple one then this should not be too much of an issue, but it could still cause a sale to fall through.

thread.title: (USA-PA-Shippingport) Nuclear Operations Instructor - Shippingport, PA
thread.title_full: (USA-PA-Shippingport) Nuclear Operations Instructor - Shippingport, PA

posts.title: (USA-PA-Shippingport) Nuclear Operations Instructor - Shippingport, PA
posts.text:
First Energy Corp. Nuclear Operations Instructor - Shippingport, PA in Shippingport , Pennsylvania 
Nuclear Operations Instructor - Shippingport, PA 
Location: Shippingport, PA, US, 15077 
Job Function: Plant Operations 
Employee Type: Reg Full Time (FT) 
Requisition ID: 7784 
FirstEnergy at a Glance 
FirstEnergy (NYSE: FE) is dedicated to safety, reliability and operational excellence. Headquartered in Akron, Ohio, FirstEnergy includes one of the nation’s largest investor-owned electric systems, more than 24,000 miles of transmission lines that connect the Midwest and Mid-Atlantic regions, and a diverse generating fleet with a total capacity of nearly 17,000 megawatts. 
About the Opportunity 
This is an open position with FENOC, a subsidiary of FirstEnergy Corp. [BVN] 
The Nuclear Operations Instructor is responsible for providing accredited training to Operations personnel to ensure the safe event free operation of the Beaver Valley Nuclear Power Station in Shippingport, Pennsylvania. 
Responsibilities of the Nuclear Operations Instructor include: 
Applying the Systematic Approach to Training (SAT) process in implementing and delivering Operations training programs. 
Developing and conducting Operations training for accredited licensed operator training programs. 
Developing and presenting of training materials for Nuclear Operations Training programs in the classroom, plant, and laboratory settings to qualified technicians and initial training candidates. 
Performing training analysis, and designing and developing training material in accordance with applicable administrative procedures. 
Examining, remediating, and evaluating student performance during training and evaluation activities and maintaining appropriate records. 
Ensuring the SAT is satisfied as described in the Institute of Nuclear Power Operations (INPO) ACAD documents. 
Overseeing of Accreditation Objectives and Criteria for assigned programs, including interfacing with INPO and Nuclear Regulatory Commission (NRC) as required. 
Interacting professionally with other station departments and outside agencies to ensure quality training is provided. 
Completing assigned activities to support timely implementation of required plant operations. 
Performing Emergency Response Organization (ERO) duties as assigned. 
Qualifications: 
High school diploma or GED required. Associate's or Bachelor's degree in a technical discipline preferred. 
Minimum of 8 years experience in Operations or Operations Training in the nuclear industry required. Experience on a Westinghouse Pressurized Water Reactor (PWR) is highly preferred. 
Experience on a Westinghouse Pressurized Water Reactor (PWR) is highly preferred. 
Holding or having previously held an RO or SRO license or certification highly preferred. 
Proficient with Microsoft Office programs, including Word, Excel, Access and PowerPoint. 
Strong written and oral communication skills, with the ability to interface effectively with all levels of management across the plant's organization. 
Must possess the coordination skills necessary to independently schedule various training courses for multiple station departments. 
Must reside within site-specific ERO response time. 
Benefits, Compensation & Workforce Diversity 
At FirstEnergy, employees are key to our success. We depend on their talents to meet the challenges of our changing business environment. We are committed to rewarding individual and team efforts through our total rewards philosophy which includes competitive pay plus incentive compensation, a company-sponsored pension plan, 401(k) savings plan with matching employer contribution, a choice of medical, prescription drug, dental, vision, and life insurance programs, as well as skills development training with tuition reimbursement. Please visit our website at www.firstenergycorp.com to learn more about all of our employee rewards programs. FirstEnergy proudly supports workforce diversity. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, or status as a qualified individual with a disability. No recruiters or agencies without a previously signed contract. Unable to sponsor or transfer H-1B visas at this time. 
Safety 
Safety is a core value for FirstEnergy and is essential to all of our business activities. We ensure employees have the tools, information, and processes to perform their duties in a manner that assures safety for themselves, their co-workers, our customers and the public. Our goals are to provide a safe work environment, to maintain an accident-free, injury-free workplace, and to promote and maintain public safety. To meet these goals, we dedicate ourselves to achieving world-class safety standards. 
Position Classification

E-Mail 뉴스레터 신청서 작성 폼 개인정보 보호를 위한 이용자 동의사항 1. 개인정보 수집 및 이용 목적 : 회사는 수집한 개인정보를 타임7(미리보는 오늘, 뉴스룸레터) 발송을 위한 확인 및 발송 등의 업무를 위해 수집, 이용하고 있습니다. 2. 수집하는 개인정보 항목 : 이메일 3. 개인정보의 보유 및 이용기간 : 수집한 개인정보는 '개인정보보호법', '정보통신망 이용촉진 등에 관한 법률' 등의 규정에 의하여 기록ㆍ보존되고, 기간이 경과할 경우 법에서 정하는 바에 따라 파기됩니다. 동의하시면 매일 오전7시(미리보는 오늘), 오후 6시(뉴스룸레터)에 타임7 뉴스레터를 동의해주신 이메일로 받아보실 수 있습니다. 위 사항에 동의합니다 * 수신동의 전 이메일 주소를 확인 후 신청 해주세요! E-Mail 닫기 군사안보연구소는 중앙일보의 군사안보분야 전문 연구기관입니다. 북핵위기 심화 및 동북아 안보환경 변화 등 미래 변화에 능동적으로 대처하기 위해 2017년 7월 1일 개소했습니다. 연구소는 대학과 정부출연 연구 기관 등과 연계해 학술행사를 개최하며, 정기적으로 자문회의를 열고 다양한 시각과 차별화된 이슈를 제시합니다. 군사안보연구소는 2016년 10월 1일 중앙일보 홈페이지 조인스( news.joins.com )에 문을 연 ‘김민석의 Mr. 밀리터리’( news.joins.com/mm )를 운영하며 디지털 환경에 특화된 군사ㆍ안보ㆍ무기에 관한 콘텐트를 만들고 있습니다. 연구소 사람들 김민석 소장 : (02-751-5511) 국방연구원 전력발전연구부ㆍ군비통제센터를 거쳐 1994년 중앙일보에 입사한 국내 첫 군사전문기자다. 국방부를 출입한 뒤 최장수 국방부 대변인(2010~2016년)으로 활동했다. 현재은 군사안보전문기자 겸 논설위원으로 한반도 군사와 안보문제를 깊게 파헤치는 글을 쓰고 있다. 박용한 연구위원 : (02-751-5516) 북한의 급변사태와 안정화 전략’을 주제로 북한학 박사를 받았다. 국방연구원 안보전략연구센터ㆍ군사기획연구센터와 고려대학교 아세아문제연구소 북한연구센터에서 군사ㆍ안보ㆍ북한을 연구했다. 2016년부터는 중앙일보에서 군사ㆍ안보 분야 취재와 기사를 쓰고 있다.

posts.text:
성범죄 성범죄 전과자 고속버스서 또 성추행? 공중밀집장소추행 나는 아닌데 1시간 전 URL 복사 본문 기타 기능 번역보기 http://blog.naver.com/nalnari7/221134708003
추실장입니다.
고속버스 안에서 잠든 여성을 추행한 혐의(준강제추행)로 기소된 김모(51)씨에게 징역 1년을 선고했다고 2일 밝혔다.
또 성폭력 치료프로그램 40시간 이수와 신상정보 3년간 공개를 명령했다.
김씨는 지난 5월 11일 오후 4시 50분께 광주발 전주행 고속버스 안에서 잠이 든 A(23·여)씨의 신체를 수차례 만진 혐의로 기소됐다.

공중밀집장소추행죄가 성립될 수 있는 장소는 어떤 곳일까요?
성폭력특별법에 의하면 공중이 밀집하는 장소라고 규정되어 있는데요.
1년 이하의 징역 또는 300만원 이하의 벌금으로 다소 가벼워보이는 처벌이라고 느끼실 수 있습니다.
하지만 이 또한 성범죄에 해당하기 때문에 벌금형 이상의 유죄판결을 받게 되면 보안처분을 받게 된다는 점 명심하셔야 겠습니다 .
따라서 관련 혐의를 받게 되었다면 사건을 진행할 때 각별히 주의해야 합니다.
견해와 입장의 차이는 평소 일상생활에서는 사소하게 생각될 수 있지만 공중밀집장소추행사건을 비롯한 성범죄사건에서는 치명적인 영향력을 나타냅니다.
사건 진행 자체가 피해자의 진술 위주로 진행되며, 누군가에게는 성추행으로, 누군가에게는 아무렇지 않은 일로 판단될 수 있는데요.
나는 그럴 의도가 없었다거나 단순한 신체접촉이라고만 생각했지만, 피해자의 입장에서는 성적 수치심이나 혐오감 등이 들었다면 사건이 성립될 수 있기 때문이죠.
저희 법무법인한길의 성범죄전담센터 문정구변호사의 실제 해결사례입니다.
만취한 의뢰인이 버스에서 우발적으로 저질렀던
공중밀집장소추행 사건인데요.
사건을 해결하기 위한 본 로펌의 조력과
깊이 뉘우치고 반성하는 의뢰인의 노력으로
기소유예로 처벌을 받지 않고
사건을 잘 마무리 할 수 있었습니다.
가지각색의 사람이 모인 자리에서 발생하는 경우가 많은 공중밀집장소추행!
시시비비를 가리는 것이 까다롭기 때문에 결국에는 법률적으로 해결을 해야 하는데요.
증거가 확실하지 않을 것으로 생각해 무조건 나는 아니라고 무죄를 주장하거나, 아무런 죄가 없음에도 거짓 진술에 의해 혐의를 받게 될 수도 있습니다.
섣부른 판단과 대처로 오히려 가중처벌을 받게 될 수 있다는 점 주의하셔야 합니다.
버스성추행, 지하철성추행 등 공중밀집장소추행 사건에 연루되어 고통받고 있다면
지금 문정구변호사와 상담하셔서 사건을 성공적으로 해결하시기 바랍니다.

thread.title: Horizon Zero Dawn: The Frozen Wilds - So gelangt ihr zu den Addon-Missionen
thread.title_full: Horizon Zero Dawn: The Frozen Wilds - So gelangt ihr zu den Addon-Missionen

posts.author: Rae Grimm
posts.title: Horizon Zero Dawn: The Frozen Wilds - So gelangt ihr zu den Addon-Missionen
posts.text:
Wer sich selbst in den eisigen Norden und das Reich der Banuk wagen möchte, für den haben wir eine kleine Starthilfe parat, wie ihr den DLC beginnen könnt. 
Es gibt insgesamt drei verschiedene Quest-Geber , mit denen ihr den Start von The Frozen Wilds hervorrufen könnt: Den adeligen Carja Rhavid findet ihr außerhalb von Meridian . Er hat Informationen und Gerüchte zum Banuk-Grenzgebiet parat, die euch auf den richtigen Weg schicken. Innerhalb des Carja-Außenpostens Tagturm an der Ostgrenze des Sonnenreichs könnt ihr Ohtur nach dem Weg zum Schnitt fragen, der Grenze zum Gebiet der Banuk im Norden der Karte. Seid ihr in der Nähe des Grabhorts im Norden des Nora-Jagdgebiets, so könnt ihr dort Yariki finden. Sie ist eine Banuk-Frau, die aus dem Schnitt geflüchtet ist und euch vor dessen Gefahren warnt. 
Wichtige Informationen vor dem Start der Erweiterung: Ihr solltet mindestens Level 30 für euer Abenteuer in The Frozen Wilds erreicht haben, auch wenn der DLC nach dem Beenden der Hauptquest "Eine Sucherin vor den Toren" (ca. Level 12) freigeschaltet wird. Trotzdem kann es nicht schaden, wenn ihr genügend Erfahrung und besseres Equipment gesammelt habt, bevor ihr euch der neuen Bedrohung und Herausforderung stellt, da es er hohe Norden ordentlich in sich hat.

thread.title: SUPLEMEN UNTUK MATA MALAS (LAZY EYES)
thread.title_full: SUPLEMEN UNTUK MATA MALAS (LAZY EYES)

posts.author: noreply@blogger.com (Safeni Feni)
posts.title: SUPLEMEN UNTUK MATA MALAS (LAZY EYES)
posts.text: Home Suplemen SUPLEMEN UNTUK MATA MALAS (LAZY EYES) SUPLEMEN UNTUK MATA MALAS (LAZY EYES) Ambliopia atau dikenali sebagai ‘mata malas’ merujuk kepada penglihatan yang kabur dan tidak dapat dibetulkan dengan cermin mata, kanta lekap atau pembedahan mata. Mata kelihatan normal dan tiada sebarang penyakit mata dikesan.Masalah ini selalunya berlaku pada satu mata dan jarang sekali pada kedua-dua belah mata. Adakah mata ambliopia buta?Tidak. Mata yang mempunyai masalah ambliopia tidak buta sepenuhnya, tetapi penglihatan pada mata ini sangat kabur dan boleh dikategorikan sebagai samada berpenglihatan terhad atau buta. Mengikut definisi Pertubuhan Kesihatan Dunia (WHO) : Buta adalah penglihatan yang kurang dari 3/60 dan Penglihatan Terhad adalah penglihatan yang kurang dari 6/18 hingga 3/60 di Carta Snellen dengan cermin mata atau kanta lekap pada mata yang terbaik.Bagaimana ambliopia berlaku?Ambliopia berlaku apabila terdapat halangan semasa informasi penglihatan dihantar dari mata ke otak semasa tempoh kritikal di peringkat awal usia iaitu dari peringkat bayi hingga 6 tahun. Halangan ini akan mengurangkan rangsangan ke bahagian otak yang memproses fungsi penglihatan. Ini menyebabkan otak tidak dapat menterjemahkan informasi yang diterima, menjadikan imej kelihatan kabur.Otak akan mengabaikan mata yang penglihatan kabur dan memilih untuk melihat dengan mata yang mempunyai penglihatan lebih baik. Akibatnya, mata yang kabur tidak digunakan dan akan menjadi ambliopia.

thread.title: 沙特：反腐才刚开始
thread.title_full: 沙特：反腐才刚开始

posts.author: netease
posts.title: 沙特：反腐才刚开始
posts.text: 新华社北京11月7日电（记者陈立希） 沙特总检察长沙特·穆吉卜6日称，被逮捕的王子和大臣已经接受讯问，将面临审判。他表示，逮捕涉腐人员是沙特反腐的“第一阶段”，沙特将开启“至关重要的进程”，根除腐败。 沙特媒体报道，这些被捕者被关押在首都利雅得的丽思卡尔顿酒店内。该酒店大门已关闭，对外联系的电话被切断。 穆吉卜发表声明称，检方已经搜集大量证据，被捕人员接受了详细讯问。所有嫌疑人均有辩护权利，案件审理将在适当时机以恰当方式进行。 穆吉卜没有就案件审理做更多说明。他表示，当局采取“第一阶段”行动时非常慎重，以防有人逃脱司法制裁。 沙特4日成立最高反腐委员会，有权对腐败犯罪嫌疑人采取逮捕、禁止出境、调取银行账户、冻结银行资金等一切必要措施，穆吉卜是最高反腐委员会成员之一。 最高反腐委员会另一成员哈立德·本·阿卜杜勒－穆赫辛·迈海森6日也发表声明称，反腐委员会发现“大规模贪腐”证据，调查人员过去3年内搜集了相当数量的证据。 “反腐委员会将继续调查贪腐案件、找出罪犯、发布逮捕令和旅行禁令，将违法者绳之以法。”迈海森说。 穆吉卜和迈海森均没有证实逮捕王子和大臣的人数与身份。据官方的沙特阿拉伯通讯社报道，沙特国王萨勒曼4日颁布国王令，宣布成立由他的儿子、现年32岁的王储穆罕默德为主席的最高反腐委员会。当晚，11名王子、38名现任和前任大臣被捕。 法新社报道，沙特机场已经叫停了私人飞机起飞。被捕人员的银行账户已被冻结，贪腐资产将被登记为国家资产。 沙特6日早些时候举行了就职仪式，王子哈立德·本·阿亚夫接替前国王阿卜杜拉的儿子米特阿卜·本·阿卜杜拉，成为沙特国民卫队新任司令，米特阿卜4日被捕。穆罕默德·图维吉里接替阿德尔·法基耶，出任经济和计划大臣，法基耶同样于4日被捕。沙特通讯社报道，国王萨勒曼出席就职仪式。 (原标题：沙特：反腐才刚开始)

thread.title: Parent with terminal illness, wondering whether to sell the family home before death
thread.title_full: Parent with terminal illness, wondering whether to sell the family home before death - MoneySavingExpert.com Forums

posts.author: PasturesNew
posts.text:
Yes, do it. You'll have to sell it at some time, so if you can get that as "one thing less to worry about each day" it makes sense.
I sold my mum's when she was in a home with dementia. I don't remember telling her I'd done it, IYSWIM. It was just one of those "unspoken things" where you just do it and carry the "guilt" of not telling them.
I had POA, which we'd set up with the solicitor that did dad's Will.

thread.title_full: 联合国波恩气候大会开幕，各方呼吁加快《巴黎协定》落实_海外时政_海外频道首页_财经网 - CAIJING.COM.CN

posts.author: 中新网
posts.title: 联合国波恩气候大会开幕，各方呼吁加快《巴黎协定》落实_海外时政_海外频道首页_财经网
posts.text:
11月6日，联合国气候变化框架公约第23次缔约方大会在德国波恩开幕。图为开幕式现场。中新社记者 彭大伟 图
中新社波恩11月6日电 《联合国气候变化框架公约》(UNFCCC)第23次缔约方大会(COP 23)6日在德国波恩开幕。参与本届气候大会的国际社会代表纷纷呼吁加快落实《巴黎协定》规定的各项任务，携手应对全球气候变化。
本届大会主席国为斐济，这是首次由小岛屿发展中国家担任气候大会主席国。由于斐济基础设施不能胜任上万名代表的接待等要求，本届大会改由《联合国气候变化框架公约》秘书处所在地德国波恩承办。
“全球各地为数众多的人们正在遭受气候变化所施加的强大威胁。”作为深受气候变化威胁的小岛屿国家，本届气候大会主席、斐济总理姆拜尼马拉马表示，各国领导人的职责就是竭尽所能去应对这些威胁，“这意味着要完整地兑现我们的承诺，而非逃避承诺。”
“我们需要勇往直前去实现将于2020年前到期的承诺。在这其中，资金和减排是关键。”《联合国气候变化框架公约》秘书处执行秘书埃斯皮诺萨呼吁在相关议题上尽快取得进展。她表示，本次波恩气候大会期间各国政府的重点工作首先是确保如期拿出《巴黎协定》的实施细则，并使得落实《巴黎协定》所需的工具和手段得到强化。
德国环境部长亨德里克斯重申了德国对联合国应对气候变化工作的支持。她宣布，德国今年将增加5000万欧元用于支持联合国气候变化适应基金。
就在大会开幕同一天，世界气象组织在一份报告中指出，2017年1月至9月的全球平均温度比工业化前时代约高1.1°C。2013-2017年已成为有记录以来最暖的五年期。
“全球气候每年都在变得更暖的事实毋庸置疑，这告诉我们，应对气候变化的行动需要立即开始，没时间浪费了。报告中的数据再次说明，气候变化前线的人们处境岌岌可危。这种情况必须要改变。”绿色和平全球总干事詹妮弗。摩根(Jennifer Morgan)表示，“今天，当谈判者们走进会议室时，心中就需要敲响应对气候变化刻不容缓的警钟。是时候履行巴黎协定承诺，实现气候雄心，承担时代赋予的责任了。”
本届波恩气候大会将持续至11月17日。德国总理默克尔、法国总统马克龙等领导人预计将出席并发表演讲。而作为美国宣布退出《巴黎协定》后举办的首次气候大会，美国代表团在本届大会上的表现亦受到各方关注。
（原题为《联合国波恩气候大会开幕 各方呼吁加快《巴黎协定》落实》）

posts.title: Bekalan Tepung Gandum Di Kerian Mencukupi
posts.text:
Bekalan Tepung Gandum Di Kerian Mencukupi Published on Nov 7, 2017 in Terkini 
PARIT BUNTAR – Bekalan tepung gandum di daerah Kerian mencukupi, kata Pegawai Penguatkuasa Kementerian Perdagangan Dalam Negeri, Koperasi dan Kepenggunaan Daerah Kerian Mohd Fazly Edros. 
Beliau berkata tular di media sosial yang mendakwa kekurangan bekalan bahan itu di daerah ini sehingga membimbangkan pengguna adalah tidak benar. 
“Berdasarkan pemeriksaan dengan pemborong dan peruncit di pekan Bagan Serai, bekalan tepung tidak berkurangan. Bekalan tepung gandum di peringkat pemborong adalah mencukupi dan mampu menampung keperluan peruncit di sekitar daerah ini,” katanya dalam kenyataan di sini hari ini. 
Mohd Fazly berkata pihaknya sentiasa membuat pemeriksaan dari semasa ke semasa dalam memastikan bekalan barangan keperluan lain termasuk tepung gandum mencukupi. – BERNAMA Loading...

thread.title: Parent with terminal illness, wondering whether to sell the family home before death
thread.title_full: Parent with terminal illness, wondering whether to sell the family home before death - MoneySavingExpert.com Forums

posts.author: Margot123
posts.text:
Having been in a very similar situation, I'd advise that you sell it.
I fell into the trap of becoming an 'accidental landlord' in order to respect the wishes of the POA donor; they always had the dream that they would return home. The stress in adopting this role was beyond words, with a 'nightmare' tenant ringing up at all hours with ridiculous complaints.
The donor was put onto palliative care but lived almost another 4 years.
In hindsight, it would have been better all round to have sold it in the first place. The donor's (unhelpful) family were the only ones to benefit in the end.

thread.title: 中国1000公斤推力涡扇发动机完成首飞试验_网易军事
thread.title_full: 中国1000公斤推力涡扇发动机完成首飞试验_网易军事

posts.author: 责任编辑：万博_NBJS5114
posts.title: 中国1000公斤推力涡扇发动机完成首飞试验_网易军事
posts.text:
（原标题：我国1000公斤推力涡扇发动机完成首飞试验）
科技日报讯 （刘一丹 卜贤坤 记者付毅飞）记者从中国航天科工三院31所获悉，近日，该所自主研制的1000公斤推力量级涡扇发动机搭载于某型飞机，经过半小时飞行后平稳降落，成功完成了蓝天首秀。
据悉，这是我国首台“飞上”蓝天的1000公斤推力量级涡扇发动机，填补了我国在该量级涡扇发动机技术领域的空白。
作为国内专业的空天动力技术研究所，31所动力产品应用已覆盖海、陆、空天全领域。本世纪初，该所捕捉到国内高端无人机及小型公务机的动力需求，率先自主开展了面向军民两用的1000公斤推力量级长寿命涡扇发动机研制工作。该所集成国内优势资源，先后成立28个设计、工艺、生产、装配、试验高度融合的快速反应攻关团队，攻克大量设计、材料、工艺、试验技术难题，通过了数百小时的部件及整机试验，完成了初始飞行前规定试验和全空域高空台性能试验，最终实现该发动机的成功首飞。
据介绍，该型发动机瞄准国际同量级先进发动机技术指标，具有长寿命、高升限、低油耗、低红外特征等特点。首次飞行试验成功，标志其研制工作取得了阶段性胜利，成为我国该量级涡扇发动机研制的重要里程碑。
资料图：国产小型涡扇发动机
本文来源：科技日报社-中国科技网 责任编辑：万博_NBJS5114

thread.title: Produk Domestik Regional Bruto (PDRB)
thread.title_full: Produk Domestik Regional Bruto (PDRB)

posts.author: Admin (noreply@blogger.com)
posts.title: Produk Domestik Regional Bruto (PDRB)
posts.text: Home » ekonomi » ilmu » Produk Domestik Regional Bruto (PDRB) Produk Domestik Regional Bruto (PDRB) Tuesday, 7 November 2017 ekonomi , ilmu Advertisement SUDUT HUKUM | Dalam konteks pembangunan daerah pendapatan perkapita adalah total pendapatan suatu daerah dibagi jumlah penduduk di daerah tersebut untuk tahun yang sama. Angka yang digunakan semestinya adalah total pendapatan regional atau Pendapatan Domestik Regional Bruto (PDRB) dibagi jumlah penduduk. Angka pendapatan per kapita atau PDRB per kapita dapat dinyatakan dalam harga berlaku maupun dalam harga konstan tergantung pada kebutuhan. Dalam penelitian ini menggunakan PDRB perkapita atas dasar harga berlaku karena berguna unutk menggambarkan pertumbuhan perekonomian daerah keseluruhan secara nyata atau riel ekonomi per kapita. Untuk itu, dijelaskan lebih lanjut tentang pengertian dari Pendapatan Domestik Regional Bruto adalah sebagai berikut: Produk Domestik Regional Bruto adalah jumlah nilai tambah bruto (gross value added) yang timbul dari seluruh sector perekonomian disuatu wilayah. Yang dimaksud dengan nilai tambah adalah nilai produksi (output) dikurangi biaya antara. Nilai tambah bruto di sini mencakup komponenkomponen pendapatan faktor (upah dan gaji, bunga, sewa tanah dan keuntungan), penyusutan dan pajak tidak langsung netto. Jadi, dengan menghitung nilai tambah bruto dari masing-masing sektor dan menjumlahkan nilai tambah bruto dari seluruh sektor tadi, akan diperoleh Produk Domestik Regional Bruto (PDRB), sedangkan Struktur Ekonomi, maksudnya gambaran perekonomian yang disajikan menurut sektor. Dalam mendapatkannya, yaitu nilai tambah dari masing-masing sektor dibandingkan dengan jumlah PDRB dan dinyatakan dalam presentase. Dengan melihat angka presentase setiap sektor tersebut, selain dapat diketahui sumbangan atau kontribusi masing-masing sektor, sekaligus juga dapat dilihat struktur perekonomian daerah yang bersangkutan dan pertumbuhan ekonomi, maksudnya untuk menilai sampai seberapa jauh keberhasilan pembangunan suatu daerah dalam periode waktu tertentu, yang dilihat dari pertumbuhan PDRB atas dasar harga berlaku. Untuk menghitung nilai seluruh produksi yang dihasilkan suatu perekonomian dalam satu tahun tertentu menurut Sukirno (1994:32) dapat digunakan 3 cara perhitungan. Ketiga cara tersebut adalah: Cara Pengeluaran. Dengan cara ini pendapatan nasional dihitung dengan menjumlahkan pengeluaran keatas barang-barang dan jasa yang diproduksikan dalam negara tersebut. Menurut cara ini pendapatan nasional adalah jumlah nilai pengeluaran rumah tangga konsumsi, rumah tangga produksi dan pengeluaran pemerintah serta pendapatan ekspor dikurangi dengan pengeluaran untuk barang-barang impor. Cara Produksi atau cara produk netto. Dengan cara ini pendapatan nasional dihitung dengan menjumlahkan nilai produksi barang atau jasa yang diwujudkan oleh berbagai sektor (lapangan usaha) dalam perekonomian. Dalam menghitung pendapatan nsaional dengan cara produksi yang dijumlahkan hanyalah nilai produksi tambahan atau value added yang diciptakan. Cara Pendapatan. Dalam perhitungan ini pendapatan nasional diperoleh dengan cara menjumlahkan pendapatan yang diterima oleh famtor-faktor produksi yang digunakan untuk mewujudkan pendapatan nasional. Adapun manfaat perhitungan nilai PDRB adalah untuk mengetahui dan menelaah struktur atau susunan perekonomian serta membandingkan perekonomian dari waktu ke waktu. PDRB suatu wilayah pada umumnya dihitung dengan menggunakan dua sistem penilaian (Sukirno (1994:33)), yaitu: Penilaian atas dasar harga berlaku. Dalam sistem penilaian ini maka seluruh barang dan jasa yang dijadikan sebagai dasar perhitungan PDRB dinilai sesuai dengan harga yang berlaku pada periode perhitungan. Penilaian atas dasar harga konstan. Dalam sistem ini barang dan jasa yang digunakan untuk menghitung PDRB dinilai berdasarkan harga yang berlaku pada periode tertentu yang dijadikan tahun dasar. Perhitungan PDRB atas dasar harga konstan dalam publikasi ini dilakukan dengan menggunakan harga tahun 2000 sebagai tahun dasar. Hasil perhitungan PDRB dengan dua sistem penilaian tersebut memiliki kegunaan yang berbeda. PDRB atas dasar harga berlaku digunakan untuk melihat ukuran atau skala perekonomian suatu wilayah, dan juga menjadi dasar untuk mengamati struktur perekonomian suatu wilayah. Sementara PDRB atas dasar harga konstan lebih banyak digunakan untuk mengamati perkembangan tingkat produksi dari seluruh inti ekonomi di suatu wilayah. PDRB atas dasar harga konstan juga merupakan data dasar yang digunakan untuk menghitung laju pertumbuhan ekonomi suatu wilayah. Advertisement

thread.title: La Ducati Panigale V4 es una bestia italiana de 214 CV y 175 kg, un LaFerrari de dos ruedas y cuatro cilindros
thread.title_full: La Ducati Panigale V4 es una bestia italiana de 214 CV y 175 kg, un LaFerrari de dos ruedas y cuatro cilindros

posts.author: Mario Herraiz
posts.text:
Antes del Salón de la moto de Milan , como si de aperitivo nos sirvieran una buena milanesa, Ducati nos ha revelado a su superbike de cuatro cilindros, una Ducati Panigale V4 que pone sobre la mesa un torrente salvaje de prestaciones, de cifras de infarto que llegan, como no podía ser de otra forma de la mano de una parte ciclo de primera y una demoledora estética. Ha nacido una nueva superdeportiva italiana y estos son todos los detalles de la Ducati Panigale V4 que tienes que conocer: 

1.- Un diseño musculoso 
Ver la galería completa en Diariomotor Viendo su frontal no cabe la menor duda de que estamos ante una Ducati , ante una Panigale , pero para esta Ducati Panigale V4 la fábrica italiana ha apostado por darle más músculo a sus formas, cuidando aún más su aerodinámica. El conjunto de sus ópticas y esas tomas delanteras le dan un aire siniestro a su mirada, el sistema de escape se integra de manera exquisita por la parte baja posterior del carenado, el colín es tan bonito como radical y las formas de su depósito y de la parte media del carenado se encargan de insuflarle todo ese músculo del que hablamos. 
2.- El motor de la Ducati Panigale V4 
Sin duda el propulsor de la Ducati Panigale V4 es la gran novedad de esta nueva superbike y es que ella firma italiana, célebre por sus motores bicilíndricos, es primeriza en esto de producir en serie un bloque de cuatro cilindros, que se distribuyen para la ocasión en forma de V4 a 90º , con un cubicaje de 1.103cc y una potencia de 214 caballos a 13.000 rpm, poniendo a nuestra disposición un par de 124 Nm a 10.000 rpm. 

Dan forma a este bloque la distribución desmodrómica, el cigüeñal contrarrotante, la admisón variable o una lubricación por un cárter semiseco y para su transmisión se recurre a un cambio de 6 velocidades con el Ducati Quick Shift EVO . 
3.- Hablemos de su parte ciclo 
El chasis de la Ducati Panigale V4 es un monocasco de aluminio en el que el V4, tumbado hacia atrás para un mejor reparto de pesos, tiene una función estructural y donde nos encontramos con tres configuraciones que varían los componentes disponibles. 

La “normal” emplea una horquilla Showa de 43 mm, un monoamortiguador Sachs y llantas de cinco radios mientras que la V4 S y la Speciale ya recurren a un conjunto Öhlins regulado electrónicamente para ambos trenes, recurriendo a unas llantas forjadas de tres radios, quedando completado en la Speciale , que estará numerada, por un sistema de escape en titanio, entre otros encantos. 

Todas recurren a un equipo Brembo para sus frenos y a unos neumáticos Pirelli Diablo Supercorsa SP con medidas 200/60 ZR17 como equipo de serie.

Sobre la báscula la Panigale V4 normal arroja un total de 175 kg en seco, 198 kg en orden de marcha y la Speciale y la S se conforman con 174 kg y 195 kg respectivamente. 
4.- La electrónica de la Ducati Panigale V4 
Ver la galería completa en Diariomotor Tratándose de una superdeportiva actual no puede faltar un amplio repertorio de ayudas electrónicas que pasan por diferentes modos de conducción, como el control de deslizamiento, el Ducati Power Launch, la gestión del freno motor, el cambio Quick Shift… sin olvidarnos, claro, de la nueva instrumentación con pantalla de 5 pulgadas.

thread.title: DxO ranks the iPhone X first in the world for photography performance, second in overall camera prowess
thread.title_full: DxO ranks the iPhone X first in the world for photography performance, second in overall camera prowess

posts.author: Adrian Diaconescu
posts.title: DxO ranks the iPhone X first in the world for photography performance, second in overall camera prowess
posts.text: It was less than a couple of months ago that DxO Labs singled out the iPhone 8 Plus as the world’s top mobile imaging performer overall , and already the French camera specialist’s smartphone rankings have a new leader. But as crazy as it sounds, a single 12MP rear-facing shooter and “conventional” 8MP selfie cam are enough for Google’s relatively inexpensive Pixel 2 to outclass the 12MP f/1.8 wide-angle + 12MP f/2.4 telephoto setup at the back of the iPhone X, as well as the incredibly complex TrueDepth system mounted on top of Apple’s first ever OLED screen. Of course, DxOMark Mobile tests don’t go into the intricacies of the groundbreaking Face ID technology or the iPhone X’s various “forward-thinking” AR tricks, focusing on your day-to-day photo and video-taking needs. When it comes to stills, hardcore iFans should be happy to hear Android rivals have nothing on the iPhone X. The “all-screen” device breaks the 100-point barrier for the first half of DxO’s camera prowess examination, narrowly beating the Pixel 2 and Huawei Mate 10 Pro . We still don’t understand exactly how these ratings work, as a score of 90 for exposure & contrast, 79 for color, 65 for texture, 58 for zoom and 55 for bokeh results in a 101 total. But the bottom line is we have a new king for stills, thanks to a natural-looking bokeh effect, accuracy color rendering and white balance in all lighting conditions, and good detail preservation using zoom. Video quality is an entirely different story, and although we wouldn’t call the iPhone X a mediocre product for making vlogs and whatnot, the 89 points tallied in the second part of DxO’s rigorous testing drive the final score down to 97, which is just shy of the Pixel 2’s mark, as well as tied with the Mate 10 Pro’s. And yes, that means the iPhone 8 Plus is now out of the top three. Share This Post

thread.title: JPMorgan sees more Saudi firms looking at overseas listings after Aramco
thread.title_full: JPMorgan sees more Saudi firms looking at overseas listings after Aramco

posts.title: JPMorgan sees more Saudi firms looking at overseas listings after Aramco
posts.text: JPMorgan sees more Saudi firms looking at overseas listings after Aramco * JPMorgan advising on Saudi Aramco listing - sources * Saudi crown prince pushing economic change * Other Gulf firms may also seek IPOs abroad By Saeed Azhar and Tom Arnold ABU DHABI, Nov 7 (Reuters) - JPMorgan is in early talks with Saudi Arabian companies about overseas listings, its investment bank chief said, raising the possibility that more firms could join oil giant Saudi Aramco <IPO-ARMO.SE> in seeking an international flotation. JPMorgan is among the banks advising Aramco on an international public offering (IPO), sources have told Reuters. Aramco's listing is part of economic reforms being pushed by Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, who wants to make the kingdom less reliant on oil and has been consolidating his power with sweeping arrests that officials say aim to end corruption. "If you want these companies to grow, they must have access to international capital markets," Daniel Pinto, chief executive of JPMorgan's investment bank, told Reuters about the possibility of other Saudi international listings. "Local companies have expressed interest to us. They are at a preliminary stage," he said in an interview in Abu Dhabi. This was the first time an influential banker has said Saudi firms other than Aramco could seek IPOs overseas. The Saudi government plans to sell about 5 percent of Aramco next year, a move that Saudi officials say could raise about $100 billion, making it the world's largest IPO. Pinto declined to comment on the bank's role in the Aramco deal or to name other firms considering international listings. JPMorgan has deep ties with the government and firms Saudi Arabia, having worked in the kingdom for more than 80 years. MOMENTUM Pinto said the bank was also in talks with other Gulf companies to list their assets overseas. He said listings in New York, London, Hong Kong or Singapore might help increase the liquidity of these companies and make them attractive for international investors, he said. "When you have this type of momentum, people will see the benefit of having a stock that is very liquid. Other companies in the region will probably follow," Pinto said. Oman said earlier this year it planned to offer shares in some state-owned downstream energy companies to the public. Analysts and bankers have said Qatar and Kuwait may also consider plans to list energy assets. JPMorgan was considering raising its headcount by 30 percent in Saudi Arabia over the next two to three years from 70 now, as business opportunities expand, Pinto said. Saudi Arabia unveiled its Vision 2030 economic plan last year to diversify the economy away from oil, with proposals to float the Aramco stake and sell other state assets. "Saudi Arabia is going through a massive transformation as they diversify their economy," Pinto said. "Over the past year, investors have reacted positively to this news." The bank's revenue from Saudi Arabia and the rest of the region is expected to be boosted by another record year of bond sales as lower oil prices curbed the ability of banks to finance investments and fund state budget deficits. Dollar-denominated bond issuance from the Gulf has totalled about $80 billion so far this year, higher than the record $63.5 billion in the whole of 2016, Thomson Reuters data shows. "The need to issue will still exist but be smaller next year because of higher oil prices and lower deficits and simply because so much refinancing was done this year," Pinto said. As part of its reform drive, the Saudi government has launched an campaign of arrests of royals, ministers and businessmen, saying it is seeking to stamp out corruption. Those detained include leading Saudi investor Prince Alwaleed bin Talal, whose investment vehicle has a stake in Citigroup. Commenting on the anti-corruption drive, Pinto said: "If it is done in the right way and for the right reasons it is good to do for the future of the kingdom." "Brazil went through a similar process. In the long-run, tackling these issues is very important," he said. Two former presidents and business officials are among those ensnared in Brazil's sprawling corruption purge. (Reporting by Saeed Azhar and Tom Arnold; Additional reporting by Davide Barbuscia; Editing by Edmund Blair) 2017-11-07 11:19:15
